summary: The Contoso Wireless TV is a 4K Ultra HD television with HDR10 for enhanced contrast and deeper colors, an advanced motion processor for smooth motion on fast-moving content, built-in Wi-Fi for easy streaming, Dolby Digital Plus audio for clear sound and dialog, and 3 HDMI inputs, 1 USB input, 1 Component input, and 1 Composite input. It also comes with a remote control, power cord, instruction manual, and a one year limited warranty. Additionally, it is compatible with voice assistants like Alexa and Google Assistant. The Contoso team is also available to help with setup and use of the product.
